Name: Strange Aeons
About the game: Escape a cyber-hell while chatting with a neural net Artificial Intelligence . Speak through the microphone or type on the keyboard . You choose. The followers of your cult are summoning you. You must escape this netherworld and reign in your rightful domain in the land of the living. Engage in a strange ritual by speaking with a mysterious Artificial Intelligence. Figure out why you were banished and cast out to hell in the first place. There is no other way out. Strange Aeons is a neural-net-AI, speech-to-text and text-to-speech powered experience. All of this works offline, without a back-end server or internet connectivity. Microphone & Keyboard controls Neural Net AI Procedural music Imaginary languages Speech recognition may be inaccurate for some voices - consider using keyboard input if you find your words not understood well enough Make sure the microphone is not clipping
